#summary This is the RoomWare Server all-in-one howto
#labels Featured

= How to run =

==Windows==
1. open a Command Prompt
2. type 'bin\run.bat'


==Linux==
1. open a Terminal
2. type 'bin/run'


= What's included? =
1. RoomWare Server Specification
2. RoomWare Server Implementation
3. Bluetooth Module
4. Rfid Module
5. Fake Module
6. Console Communicator
7. Http Communicator
